channel.title: Cdr on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Cdr on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Importing Master.csv into MySQL CDR table
item.description: Edit: I have updated the original post, which contained ‘custom’ field name in the database instead of ‘userfield’ which is a field Asterisk-Stat uses. Edit2: Updated the field from ‘amaflag’ to ‘amaflags’ thanks to Justin. Edit3: Updated the script based on feedback from Mads Peter Nielsen and Gabriel. Thanks! Today I had a client that had a need to run some statistical analysis on their data, but since they didn’t have anything like that developed, I had to go on a search to find them something.
